example.name: all args
example.text: The U.S. defines it as ``[premediated, politically motivated violence]-1 perpetrated [*]-1 against noncombatant targets by subnational groups or clandestine state agents.''
example.arg: by subnational groups or clandestine state agents

roleset.note: It could be argued that the victim arg is part of the crime arg(violence against noncombatants as a constituent, in other words).
